levels.description: Upon deployment, immediately deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all nearby enemies, pushes them back <@ba.vup>slightly</>, and randomly inflicts one of the following statuses to all targets hit (<$ba.sluggish>slow</>, <$ba.root>bind</>, or <$ba.stun>stun</>) for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</> seconds
